summary: This document is a Florida criminal history record for an individual, likely a female, with multiple arrests and charges in Palm Beach County and Volusia County between 2005 and 2013. The record includes charges for drug possession, drug paraphernalia, failure to appear, probation violation, aggravated assault, fraud, larceny, and dealing in stolen property. It was accessed via an NCIC inquiry in 2021.

events.description: Arrest by North Palm Beach Police Department for fraud/false statement, grand theft, and dealing in stolen property. The individual pleaded guilty to fraud and dealing in stolen property, receiving a 32-day jail sentence and 24 months probation.

keyFacts: The subject, likely named Carolyn, has an extensive criminal history in Florida from 2005 to 2013, with multiple arrests in Palm Beach County.
Charges include drug possession (cocaine, Schedule IV substances), drug paraphernalia, failure to appear, probation violation, aggravated assault, fraud, grand theft, and dealing in stolen property.
The individual was convicted on several charges, receiving jail time (2 days, 32 days) and probation (24 months).
The record was accessed via an NCIC inquiry on January 20, 2021, indicating ongoing law enforcement interest.
Some records are noted as sealed or expunged pursuant to Florida statutes.
